trans-unit.source: Instructs obfuscation tools to take the specified actions for an assembly, type, or member.
trans-unit.target: 指示模糊处理工具对程序集、类型或成员采取指定的操作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute> and <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute> attributes allow assembly authors to annotate their binaries so that obfuscation tools can process them correctly with minimal external configuration.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute>和<xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute>属性允许程序集作者，以对其二进制文件进行批注，以便模糊处理工具可以用最小的外部配置正确处理它们。

trans-unit.source: Applying this attribute does not automatically obfuscate the code entity to which you apply it.
trans-unit.target: 应用此特性不会自动模糊处理应用到的代码实体。

trans-unit.source: Applying the attribute is an alternative to creating a configuration file for the obfuscation tool.
trans-unit.target: 应用此特性是创建模糊处理工具的配置文件的替代方法。

trans-unit.source: That is, it merely provides instructions for an obfuscation tool.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，它只提供有关模糊处理工具的说明。

trans-unit.source: Microsoft recommends that vendors of obfuscation tools follow the semantics described here.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft 建议的模糊处理工具供应商遵循此处所述的语义。

trans-unit.source: However, there is no guarantee that a particular tool follows Microsoft recommendations.
trans-unit.target: 但是，没有特定的工具，如下所示 Microsoft 建议能保证。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute> attribute has a string <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.Feature%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute>特性具有一个字符串<xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.Feature%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Obfuscation tools can map the string values of this property to features they implement, preferably by using an XML configuration file that users can access.
trans-unit.target: 模糊处理工具可以将此属性的字符串值映射到其实现，最好是通过使用 XML 配置文件以便用户可访问的功能。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute> defines two feature strings, "default" and "all".
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute>定义两个功能字符串、"default"和"全部"。

trans-unit.source: The string "default" should map to the default obfuscation features of a tool, and "all" should map to the complete set of obfuscation features supported by a tool.
trans-unit.target: 字符串"default"应映射到默认模糊处理功能的工具和"全部"应映射到支持的一种工具的模糊处理功能的完整集合。

trans-unit.source: The default value of the <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.Feature%2A> property is "all", enabling the complete set of obfuscation features.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.Feature%2A>属性为"全部"，启用完整的模糊处理功能集。

trans-unit.source: When applied to an assembly, <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute> also applies to all types within the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 当应用于程序集，<xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute>也适用于程序集内的所有类型。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.ApplyToMembers%2A> property is not specified, or is set to `true`, the attribute applies to all members as well.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.ApplyToMembers%2A>属性未指定，或设置为`true`，该属性适用于所有成员以及。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute> does not specify whether an assembly is public or private.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute> 未指定程序集是公共或私有。

trans-unit.source: To specify whether an assembly is public or private, use the <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定程序集是公共或私有的使用<xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute>属性。

trans-unit.source: When applied to classes and structures, <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute> also applies to all members of the type if the <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.ApplyToMembers%2A> property is not specified, or is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 当应用于类和结构，<xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute>也适用于类型的所有成员，如果<xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.ApplyToMembers%2A>属性未指定，或设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: When applied to methods, parameters, fields, and properties, the attribute affects only the entity to which it is applied.
trans-unit.target: 当应用于方法、 参数、 字段和属性，该属性会影响仅应用到的实体。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a public assembly with two types: `Type1` and `Type2`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示具有两种类型的公共程序集：`Type1`和`Type2`。

trans-unit.source: The assembly is marked for obfuscation with the <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute>, which marks the assembly to be treated as public (that is, the <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute.AssemblyIsPrivate%2A> property is `false`).
trans-unit.target: 该程序集标记为与模糊处理<xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute>，这会将要被视为公共的程序集 (即，<xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute.AssemblyIsPrivate%2A>属性是`false`)。

trans-unit.source: `Type1` is marked for obfuscation because the assembly is marked for obfuscation.
trans-unit.target: `Type1` 被标记为模糊处理，因为该程序集标记为模糊处理。

trans-unit.source: One member of `Type1` is excluded from obfuscation, using the <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.Exclude%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 一个成员`Type1`排除从模糊处理，使用<xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.Exclude%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: `Type2` is excluded from obfuscation, but its members are marked for obfuscation because the <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.ApplyToMembers%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: `Type2` 排除从模糊处理，但其成员标记为模糊处理，因为<xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.ApplyToMembers%2A>属性是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The `MethodA` method of `Type2` is marked with the value `"default"` for the <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.Feature%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `MethodA`方法`Type2`标记具有值`"default"`为<xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.Feature%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: It is necessary to specify `false` for the <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.Exclude%2A> property to avoid excluding `MethodA` from obfuscation, because the default for the <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.Exclude%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 需要指定`false`为<xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.Exclude%2A>属性以避免不包括`MethodA`从模糊处理，因为的默认值为<xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.Exclude%2A>属性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: The obfuscation tool should not strip the attribute after obfuscation because the <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.StripAfterObfuscation%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 模糊处理工具应不去除该特性在模糊处理后因为<xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.StripAfterObfuscation%2A>属性是`false`。

trans-unit.source: All the other attributes in this code example are stripped after obfuscation, because the <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.StripAfterObfuscation%2A> property is not specified, and therefore defaults to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例中的所有其他特性被剥离在模糊处理之后，因为<xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.StripAfterObfuscation%2A>属性未指定，因此默认值为`true`。

trans-unit.source: The code example includes code to display the attributes and their properties.
trans-unit.target: 代码示例包含代码以显示这些特性并将其属性。

trans-unit.source: You can also examine the attributes by opening the DLL with the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md).
trans-unit.target: 您还可以通过打开与 DLL 检查特性[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute> does not specify whether an assembly is public or private.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute> 未指定程序集是公共或私有。

trans-unit.source: To specify whether an assembly is public or private, use <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定程序集是公共或私有的使用<xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value indicating whether the attribute of a type is to apply to the members of the type.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，该值指示某一类型的特性是否应用到该类型的成员。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the attribute is to apply to the members of the type; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该特性要应用到类型的成员，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is ignored when the attribute is applied to a member.
trans-unit.target: 该属性应用于成员时，将忽略此属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Applying this attribute does not automatically obfuscate the code entity to which you apply it.
trans-unit.target: 应用此特性不会自动模糊处理应用到的代码实体。

trans-unit.source: Applying the attribute is an alternative to creating a configuration file for the obfuscation tool.
trans-unit.target: 应用此特性是创建模糊处理工具的配置文件的替代方法。

trans-unit.source: That is, it merely provides instructions for an obfuscation tool.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，它只提供有关模糊处理工具的说明。

trans-unit.source: Microsoft recommends that vendors of obfuscation tools follow the semantics described here.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft 建议的模糊处理工具供应商遵循此处所述的语义。

trans-unit.source: However, there is no guarantee that a particular tool follows Microsoft recommendations.
trans-unit.target: 但是，没有特定的工具，如下所示 Microsoft 建议能保证。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a type that is excluded from obfuscation, but the exclusion does not apply to its members because the <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.ApplyToMembers%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示从模糊处理，排除的类型，但因为，排除不应用于其成员<xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.ApplyToMembers%2A>属性是`false`。

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example that can be compiled and executed.
trans-unit.target: 此代码是示例的一个更大可以编译和执行的一部分。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute> class.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute> 类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value indicating whether the obfuscation tool should exclude the type or member from obfuscation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，该值指示模糊处理工具是否应将类型或成员从模糊处理中排除。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the type or member to which this attribute is applied should be excluded from obfuscation; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用该特性的类型或成员应从模糊处理中排除，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Applying this attribute does not automatically obfuscate the code entity to which you apply it.
trans-unit.target: 应用此特性不会自动模糊处理应用到的代码实体。

trans-unit.source: Applying the attribute is an alternative to creating a configuration file for the obfuscation tool.
trans-unit.target: 应用此特性是创建模糊处理工具的配置文件的替代方法。

trans-unit.source: That is, it merely provides instructions for an obfuscation tool.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，它只提供有关模糊处理工具的说明。

trans-unit.source: Microsoft recommends that vendors of obfuscation tools follow the semantics described here.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft 建议的模糊处理工具供应商遵循此处所述的语义。

trans-unit.source: However, there is no guarantee that a particular tool follows Microsoft recommendations.
trans-unit.target: 但是，没有特定的工具，如下所示 Microsoft 建议能保证。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a type that is marked to be excluded from obfuscation.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了标记要从模糊处理中排除的类型。

trans-unit.source: It is not necessary to specify the <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.Exclude%2A> property, because it defaults to `true`, but specifying it explicitly makes your intent clear.
trans-unit.target: 不需要指定<xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.Exclude%2A>属性，因为它将默认为`true`，但显式指定可以在你的意图更明显。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.ApplyToMembers%2A> is set to `false`, so that the exclusion from obfuscation does not apply to the members of the class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.ApplyToMembers%2A>设置为`false`，以便从模糊处理排除不适用于类的成员。

trans-unit.source: That is, the class name is visible but the members are obfuscated.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，类名称是可见的但对成员进行模糊处理。

trans-unit.source: The `MethodA` method is marked with the value `"default"` for the <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.Feature%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `MethodA`方法将标有值`"default"`为<xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.Feature%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: It is necessary to specify `false` for the <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.Exclude%2A> property in order to avoid excluding `MethodA` from obfuscation, because the default for the <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.Exclude%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 需要指定`false`为<xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.Exclude%2A>属性，以便避免排除`MethodA`从模糊处理，因为的默认值为<xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.Exclude%2A>属性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.StripAfterObfuscation%2A> property is `false` so that the obfuscation tool will not strip the attribute after obfuscation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.StripAfterObfuscation%2A>属性是`false`以便模糊处理工具不会在模糊处理后去除特性。

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example that can be compiled and executed.
trans-unit.target: 此代码是示例的一个更大可以编译和执行的一部分。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute> class.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute> 类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string value that is recognized by the obfuscation tool, and which specifies processing options.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个字符串值，该字符串值可由模糊处理工具识别并指定处理选项。

trans-unit.source: A string value that is recognized by the obfuscation tool, and which specifies processing options.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串值，可由模糊处理工具识别并指定处理选项。

trans-unit.source: The default is "all".
trans-unit.target: 默认为“all”。

trans-unit.source: The value passed to this property depends on the obfuscation tool used.
trans-unit.target: 传递给此属性的值取决于使用模糊处理工具。

trans-unit.source: It is recommended that vendors of obfuscation tools support at least "default" and "all".
trans-unit.target: 建议该供应商至少支持工具的模糊处理的"默认"和"全部"。

trans-unit.source: Vendors can use these settings in conjunction with the XML configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 供应商可以使用这些设置结合使用的 XML 配置文件。

trans-unit.source: Applying this attribute does not automatically obfuscate the code entity to which you apply it.
trans-unit.target: 应用此特性不会自动模糊处理应用到的代码实体。

trans-unit.source: Applying the attribute is an alternative to creating a configuration file for the obfuscation tool.
trans-unit.target: 应用此特性是创建模糊处理工具的配置文件的替代方法。

trans-unit.source: That is, it merely provides instructions for an obfuscation tool.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，它只提供有关模糊处理工具的说明。

trans-unit.source: Microsoft recommends that vendors of obfuscation tools follow the semantics described here.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft 建议的模糊处理工具供应商遵循此处所述的语义。

trans-unit.source: However, there is no guarantee that a particular tool follows Microsoft recommendations.
trans-unit.target: 但是，没有特定的工具，如下所示 Microsoft 建议能保证。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a method that is marked with the value `"default"` for the <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.Feature%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示将标有值的方法`"default"`为<xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.Feature%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: It is necessary to specify `false` for the <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.Exclude%2A> property to avoid excluding `MethodA` from obfuscation, because the default for the <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.Exclude%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 需要指定`false`为<xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.Exclude%2A>属性以避免不包括`MethodA`从模糊处理，因为的默认值为<xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.Exclude%2A>属性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.StripAfterObfuscation%2A> property is `false` so that the obfuscation tool will not strip the attribute after obfuscation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.StripAfterObfuscation%2A>属性是`false`以便模糊处理工具不会在模糊处理后去除特性。

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example that can be compiled and executed.
trans-unit.target: 此代码是示例的一个更大可以编译和执行的一部分。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute> class.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute> 类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value indicating whether the obfuscation tool should remove this attribute after processing.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，该值指示模糊处理工具是否应在处理后移除此特性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if an obfuscation tool should remove the attribute after processing; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果模糊处理工具应在处理后移除该特性，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Attributes should not be stripped if your library will be included as part of another application, and obfuscated as part of that application.
trans-unit.target: 如果将包含的另一个应用程序，你的库，并将其作为该应用程序的一部分进行模糊处理，则不应去除属性。

trans-unit.source: Applying this attribute does not automatically obfuscate the code entity to which you apply it.
trans-unit.target: 应用此特性不会自动模糊处理应用到的代码实体。

trans-unit.source: Applying the attribute is an alternative to creating a configuration file for the obfuscation tool.
trans-unit.target: 应用此特性是创建模糊处理工具的配置文件的替代方法。

trans-unit.source: That is, it merely provides instructions for an obfuscation tool.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，它只提供有关模糊处理工具的说明。

trans-unit.source: Microsoft recommends that vendors of obfuscation tools follow the semantics described here.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft 建议的模糊处理工具供应商遵循此处所述的语义。

trans-unit.source: However, there is no guarantee that a particular tool follows Microsoft recommendations.
trans-unit.target: 但是，没有特定的工具，如下所示 Microsoft 建议能保证。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows an <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute> whose <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.StripAfterObfuscation%2A> property is `false` so that the obfuscation tool will not strip the attribute after obfuscation.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示<xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute>其<xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.StripAfterObfuscation%2A>属性是`false`以便模糊处理工具不会在模糊处理后去除特性。

trans-unit.source: It is necessary to specify `false` for the <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.Exclude%2A> property to avoid excluding `MethodA` from obfuscation, because the default for the <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.Exclude%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 需要指定`false`为<xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.Exclude%2A>属性以避免不包括`MethodA`从模糊处理，因为的默认值为<xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute.Exclude%2A>属性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example that can be compiled and executed.
trans-unit.target: 此代码是示例的一个更大可以编译和执行的一部分。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute> class.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 <xref:System.Reflection.ObfuscationAttribute> 类。
